ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (16:22): d5e0b073765cd0a45ace9f843b8eaf88: Are you trying to move the centre of the circle? You would have to either change the coordinates or call translate() to do that

cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (16:24): f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220: i.e., should they be synonyms with <i> and <b> or be more specific semantics as currently defined?
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (16:24): it was only about The <b> and <i> elements
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (16:24): I made the assumption that they would keep their current definitions of emphasis and importance for now

cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (16:27): f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220: your original feed entry shows up as "The <b> and <i> Elements" in opera
f139aba52f9fa1394b4034a7954b2220 (16:29): I could take out the < and >, which would work around the problem, but then those services probably won't update the feed anyway
